CmdLine: echo 'deb http://jp.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu trusty main restricted'  && echo 'deb-src http://jp.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu trusty main restricted'  && echo 'deb http://jp.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu trusty-updates main restricted'  && echo 'deb-src http://jp.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu trusty-updates main restricted'
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get -q -y update  && apt-get -q -y install git wget tar gzip build-essential python-dev  && apt-get -q -y install curl nodejs-legacy npm  && apt-get -q -y clean && rm -rf /var/cache/apt/archives/* /var/lib/apt/lists/*
